data.name: Amina Mohammed Abdullahi
data.title: Field Supervisor
data.testimonial: AgLane is the best and most outstanding company I have ever worked with. I am proud to be part of the AgLane family.

data.name: Moses Oke
data.title: Field Manager
data.testimonial: AgLane Nigeria Ltd. has created an enabling environment for me to learn about agricultural innovation. The organization has provided me with a platform for disseminating agricultural information to rural communities.
